value:
$WmMPID_双界リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_FF_Pair,Face|...So, because of its historical use,
restrictions have been placed on the
usage of powerful magic in Khadein.$k$p$nMPID_サラ|I see... No matter the world, it seems
there are those who are attracted to
the darkness.$k$pThank you for sharing the history
of Khadein with me, Linde.$k$p$nMPID_双界リンダ|Of course! And if you have any
questions, ask away. Though, I am
still in the process of learning, myself.$k$p$nMPID_サラ|I found everything you said easy
to understand! Do you think you'll
be a teacher one day?$k$p$nMPID_双界リンダ|A teacher? Me? I couldn't possibly!$k$pThough it is true that there's a magic
school within the palace as well...$k$pI suppose it would be nice if
I could share what I've learned
with everyone there...$k$p$nMPID_サラ|That sounds like a good plan...
Professor Linde.$k$p$nMPID_双界リンダ|Oh, come now! Don't tease!
I'm no professor...$k$p$nMPID_サラ|Ah! But I can tell you like the sound
of it, hee hee!$k$p

$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|Oh, Linde! Sara!$k$p$WmMPID_サラ,ch01_07_Rinda_FF_Pair,Face|Hello, Nino. Do you need something?$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|Well, my professor in Khadein has
been teaching me a particular sort of
magic, but I can't seem to grasp it...$k$pBut I've heard you know a lot
about Khadein, Linde, so...I was
hoping you could teach me.$k$p$WmMPID_双界リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_FF_Pair,Face|M-me? Oh, of course! I'd be happy
to help any way I can.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|Thank you so much! I feel like
I'm finally getting it now. I knew
you'd be able to help me, Linde!$k$p$WmMPID_双界リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_FF_Pair,Face|Hee hee... Well, I'm willing to help
anytime you need anything!$k$p$Sbs150|
